text: Billy Paul (Paul Williams; December 1, 1934 - April 24, 2016) was an American R&B; singer. His biggest hit was "Me and Mrs. Jones". He was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Paul died on the afternoon of April 24, 2016 in Blackwood, New Jersey after suffering from pancreatic cancer at the age of 81. ==References== Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Singers from Philadelphia Category:American R&B; singers Category:Cancer deaths in New Jersey Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:1934 births Category:2016 deaths
title: Billy Paul
